title: Conduct Pre-Task Safety Briefing
description: Before starting a concrete demolition task, a foreman must conduct and document a pre-task safety briefing with the crew.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Job Hazard Analysis (JHA) for 'Concrete Demolition'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The relevant JHA document is retrieved.

tasks.description: Log that a pre-task briefing was held, covering the hazards and controls listed in the JHA.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new entry is made in the safety meeting log.

tasks.description: Record the names of the 6 crew members who attended the briefing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The attendee list is added to the log entry.
